attributes.action: Legislate protection for children under 16 using  public toilet facilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All public toilets should have an attendant if children use the facilities, this should be enforced by law.
Children are especially vulnerable in cinemas, parks, funfairs amongst other establishments.
Sexual perverts hunt young people in these toilets and damage them forever.
